text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: … T-this… You brought it back…? Wait. What about the towing—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah, we borrowed it from your mentor. … I get how you feel, but I thought you should see it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: There's… so much to learn from this machine. A lot of… important things.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: ……………… … It's so beaten up……… Ah, but the internals are……

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Oh, wow! Not a single one of these pipes broke……! I went through so much trial and error with master to find the best way for it to withstand the internal pressure!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Wow, this durability…… master's hypothesis was right! Then the cylinders……!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, why're there two windows on the cockpit? Looks heavy and hard to see out of!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Ah, well, that's because master gets cold easily! So he used double glazing to really keep the outside air out.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: We did have to lighten the seats and instruments in return, it was so much work to adjust! Here, look at this seam in the seat! We opened it here and removed the filling…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, that one seam is all raggedy! Show me more! What else is there?

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: ………… Basically…… everything!! Master and me, we put everything into this plane!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: I remember…… When we were working… master always had a smile on his face…… He looked so happy, like a child…

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: He always spoke passionately about how one day he would cross the mountains! And I… I thought I'd always be there with him…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You can harness the passion of your mentor and predecessors. You can take all their dreams and efforts — to the skies.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: ……! I always thought I took master's dreams from him… I was afraid to find it be true… and didn't want to know what caused the failure!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: But…… I finally understand. I have to confront this plane and carry on my mentor's research ― his dream!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: To ensure his efforts end in success!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ―That's what I have been waiting to hear.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It is you, not us, who will carry on your mentor's dream. The only one here who knows everything he gave for it is you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: With that said, allow me to prove myself useful. EX Job Change!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Looking at the research data, your strengths seem to lie in engines and motive power. Thus, I will take on designs. My forte is formulae and calculations, so leave those to me!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Wahh, designs!? Then I have some questions……!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Yes, let's examine every detail. But actually, we've brought one more talented researcher that this aircraft has beckoned.

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text: Well you just wouldn't introduce me, I almost thought you up and forgot about me! Pleased to meet, I'm a researcher of metal and its alloys!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Ahh, hi! Nice to meet you……! You also do research on iron planes…?

text_block_list.name: Metal Researcher
text_block_list.text: Yes, I do. And I have an immediate suggestion! How about using this alloy in the engine? It's an alloy of iron and a mineral I recently produced—

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: …… It what!? Tell me the detailed values from your experiments, please!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Interesting, I had been thinking the iron in this world exhibits different properties to ours. No wonder it has such strangely many applications.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: If we can reduce the weight that much, moving the engine over here would allow us to change the wing size, x being—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, they're immediately on the same wavelength! This research will be done in no time!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: And her mentor's efforts will be put to good use… awwaaah! I'm so reliiieeefetd! It's all thanks to you, Hayahideee!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Adapting her approach based on failures, that's so Hayahide!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: ―Hey, Ticky. You know how I said we can't let failures be the end? I think someone should hear that there's a value to… the dreams we couldn't accomplish too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's right! Let's go together, Teio!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Delivery for you, Mr. Mentor!

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: …… A slip of paper?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: A Dream Ticket, VIP seats!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You'll find a time and place on it for a test flight!

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: ! …… That so… Well, good luck.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey now! Your pupil was saying… she'll finish your dream!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: We've put together a whole new plane, from the old one, from the results of your research.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: …… She's done it, you know? She's carried on your hopes and dreams. Are you really fine not seeing them to the end?

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: …… My dream's… no longer……

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It sure is! That girl's connected the dreams of many!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: No worries! This ticket is a winning one! A straight ride to victory!
